{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=MBR1200 |revision=B |upc=804879391876 |asin=B007ED8EXG |fcc_date=03/29/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=MPB-387L |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UXX-MBR1200B |ic_id=6921A-MBR1200B |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3352 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0,ExpressCard/34 (USB) |expansion_expresscard_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3352 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable,4G capable |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=MBR1200B-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^MBR1200B-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |oui=00:30:44 |oui_eth=00:30:44 |default_ch= }} ''CradlePoint MBR1200B Small Business Mobile Broadband Router''
[http://www.cradlepoint.com/products/small-business-home-office-routers/mbr1200b-small-business-mobile-broadband-router Product page] Per the FCC test report, this device uses RT3352. The default password is on the bottom of the device on the label. ==Images== Image:Top-View-MBR1200B_Web.jpg|angled Image:Port-View-MBR1200B_web.jpg|front, ports Image:LEDs-MBR1200B_web.jpg|LED panel Image:Back-View-MBR1200B_web.jpg|back Image:cradlepoint_mbr1200_securityenclosure.jpg|security enclosure [[Has images::external| ]]
